definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-upper case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非大寫字母的字符。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the word-end boundary assertion.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於判斷單詞結束邊界的字符。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents a non-word character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非單詞字符的字符。

sentences.english: The expect and reply strings may contain escape sequences.
sentences.chinese: 期待以及回覆字串可以包含轉義序列。

sentences.english: Post-processor bug fix for escaped XML code that it does not recognize.
sentences.chinese: 對於不被公認的轉義XML的後處理中的缺陷修正。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-space character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非空白字符的字符。

sentences.english: Characters are escaped with a backslash automatically.
sentences.chinese: 字元都會被自動加上一個反斜線進行轉義。

sentences.english: Single quotation marks interpolate and see the backslashes as escape characters.
sentences.chinese: 單引號插入並將反斜槓看作是轉義符。

sentences.english: It must be escaped in basic syntax.
sentences.chinese: 在基本語法中它必須轉義。

sentences.english: This happens when one escapes text that has already been escaped.
sentences.chinese: 如果轉義已經轉義的文本就會出現這種情況。

sentences.english: This happens when one escapes text that has already been escaped.
sentences.chinese: 如果轉義已經轉義的文本就會出現這種情況。

sentences.english: Any special character preceded by an escape shall match itself.
sentences.chinese: 肆意特殊字符前邊加轉義符都般配本身。

sentences.english: Specifies an escape character that is used to indicate that a parameter marker character in a name is meant literally.
sentences.chinese: 指定用於表示名稱中參數標記原義的轉義符。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-lower case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非小寫字母的字符。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the end quote operator.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於標識引用操作符結束的字符。

sentences.english: Use escape sequences to manage long input.
sentences.chinese: 使用轉義序列來管理較長的輸入。
